text: Brian Austin Green Net Worth : Brian Austin Green is an American actor who has a net worth of $ 4 million dollars. Born July 15, 1973 in Van Nuys, California, Brian Austin Green is best known for his role as David Silver on the television series Beverly Hills, 90210 ( 1990 - 2000 ). Prior to his role on Beverly Hills, 90210, Green had a recurring role ( 1986 â€“ 1989 ) on the hit CBS prime time soap opera Knots Landing, playing the role of Brian Cunningham, the son of Abby Cunningham Ewing ( Donna Mills ). He starred as a series regular in Terminator : The Sarah Conner Chronicles, Freddie, Wedding Band and Anger Management.
